Imports

spec

Types

Operator = enum
  Tag = "#", Wild = "*", Tilde = "~", Caret = "^", Equal = "==", AtLeast = ">=",
  Over = ">", Under = "<", NotMore = "<="
  Source   Edit 
Release = object
  case kind*: Operator
  of Tag:
      reference*: string

  of Wild, Caret, Tilde:
      accepts*: VersionMask

  of Equal, AtLeast, Over, Under, NotMore:
      version*: Version
  Source   Edit 
VersionField = typeof(Version.major)
  Source   Edit 
VersionIndex = range[0 .. 2]
  Source   Edit 
VersionMask = object
  major*: VersionMaskField
  minor*: VersionMaskField
  patch*: VersionMaskField
  Source   Edit 
VersionMaskField = Option[VersionField]
  Source   Edit
